p:
Additionally, we compared our eQTL to a publically available fetal brain eQTL resource
43 and found good replication of these eQTL as well (estimated replication rate π 1 = 0.909 for the cortical meta-analysis, and π 1 = 0.861 for cerebellum), though somewhat lower than the replication observed in the GTEx cohorts, which are comprised of adult-derived samples.
